showScoreExcerpt: Unforgettable. Simply one of the most exquisite works of musical storytelling I've seen in my more than 25 years as a theater critic. In its supple convergence of story and song, Hadestown represents a step forward for the art form.

keyPhrases.quote: Unforgettable. Simply one of the most exquisite works of musical storytelling I've seen in my more than 25 years as a theater critic.
Hadestown represents a step forward for the art form
supple convergence of story and song

llmScore.reasoning: Claude: Unqualified superlatives from an experienced critic ('unforgettable', 'most exquisite', 'step forward for the art form') with 25+ years of authority signal a clear rave recommendation. | GPT-4o-mini: The review expresses unqualified enthusiasm and high praise for the production, indicating it as a must-see experience.
